mapper.select: SELECT ADMISSION_DATE, ADMISSION_DUEDATE, PATIENT_NAME, GENDER, PATIENT_ADDR, PATIENT_TEL, DIAGNOSTIC_NAME, EMP_NAME, SPECIALITY_NAME,PROTECTOR_NAME,PROTECTOR_TEL FROM admission_tb AS a LEFT JOIN treatment_info_tb AS b ON a.TREATMENT_NUM_FK = b.TREATMENT_NUM_PK LEFT JOIN patient_tb AS c ON b.PATIENT_ID_FK = c.PATIENT_ID_PK LEFT JOIN emp_info_tb AS d ON b.EMP_ID_FK = d.EMP_ID_PK LEFT JOIN speciality_tb AS e ON d.SPECIALITY_ID_FK= e.SPECIALITY_ID_PK LEFT JOIN admission_status AS f ON a.ADMISSION_STATUS_CODE = f.ADMISSION_STATUS_CODE WHERE c.PATIENT_NAME = #{name} AND f.AD_CODE_NAME = #{adCodeName} AND a.WARD = #{ward} AND a.ROOM_NUM = #{roomNum} AND a.BED_NUM= #{bedNum};

SELECT A.ADMISSION_ID_PK , C.PATIENT_NAME , E.SPECIALITY_NAME, E.WARD, D.EMP_NAME , date_format(B.TREATMENT_DATE,'%H%I') as T_TIME ,B.TREATMENT_MEMO FROM ADMISSION_TB AS A LEFT JOIN TREATMENT_INFO_TB AS B ON A.TREATMENT_NUM_FK = B.TREATMENT_NUM_PK LEFT JOIN PATIENT_TB AS C ON B.PATIENT_ID_FK = C.PATIENT_ID_PK LEFT JOIN EMP_INFO_TB AS D ON B.EMP_ID_FK = D.EMP_ID_PK LEFT JOIN SPECIALITY_TB AS E ON D.SPECIALITY_ID_FK = E.SPECIALITY_ID_PK WHERE ADMISSION_STATUS_CODE = 'IA' ORDER BY T_TIME ASC;
mapper.update: UPDATE ADMISSION_TB SET ward = #{ward} , room_num = #{roomNum} , bed_num = #{bedNum} , ADMISSION_STATUS_CODE = "IB" WHERE ADMISSION_ID_PK = #{admissionIdPk};
UPDATE BED_TB SET BED_STATUS = 1 WHERE ward = #{ward} AND room_num = #{roomNum} AND bed_num = #{bedNum};
mapper.select: SELECT A.ADMISSION_ID_PK ,PATIENT_NAME , if(substr(PATIENT_SSN,8,1)=1 or substr(PATIENT_SSN,8,1)=3 , 'M' ,'W') as GENDER , (date_format(now(),'%Y')- concat('19',substr(PATIENT_SSN,1,2)))+1 as AGE, PATIENT_SSN, A.WARD+A.ROOM_NUM as WARDROOM, A.BED_NUM FROM ADMISSION_TB AS A LEFT JOIN TREATMENT_INFO_TB AS B ON A.TREATMENT_NUM_FK = B.TREATMENT_NUM_PK LEFT JOIN PATIENT_TB AS C ON B.PATIENT_ID_FK = C.PATIENT_ID_PK LEFT JOIN EMP_INFO_TB AS D ON B.EMP_ID_FK = D.EMP_ID_PK LEFT JOIN SPECIALITY_TB AS E ON D.SPECIALITY_ID_FK = E.SPECIALITY_ID_PK WHERE ADMISSION_STATUS_CODE = 'IB';
mapper.update: UPDATE ADMISSION_TB SET ADMISSION_DATE = now() , ADMISSION_STATUS_CODE = "IC" WHERE ADMISSION_ID_PK = #{admissionIdPk};
